Summary: Spotted a white object high in the sky
trends: There have been 11 other sightings in Fountain
There were no other sightings in Fountain on or around April 10th 2010
divs: sighting detailsthis may be nothing but a weather balloon. i am not sure, i was working in my back yard. i was headed to a shed to pick up a tool. when i noticed something very high in the sky. being a member of mufon and a part time astronomer (among other things). i decided to just submit it to see if some one else has seen it. anyway it was very slow moving north (a little west of polaris) no contrail, being white it stood out against the blue sky. it was north of my position at aprox a 60 degree angle. i ran into the house to get my nikon d-2x camera and 600 mm lens. by the time i got back out, it was gone (less than 5 mins). it could be nothing, it was not a bird nor a cloud nor an airplane. being a part time amateur astronomer i know the difference between comets, stars or planets. i can't estimate the height, when i saw it looked like a white circle about the size of the end of a 1\4 drill bit and very high in the sky.
